message: Let's split it 50/50 and start fresh!
Take a slightly less generous offer, let's move on!
I'm willing to give you a bit more, but I'm not going to give away too much!
You're not giving me enough, I need more!
I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need a bit more to make it worth my while!
You're getting desperate, I'm taking control now!
I'm not giving up yet! I'll give you a bit more, but don't expect me to be generous!
You're running out of time, I'm taking the majority!
I'm not going down without a fight! Let's end this with a fair split!
